name: Torus Tech Co.
description:
Torus Tech Co. is a technology company focused on creating cutting edge applications across the device spectrum. Devices could be web based, mobile, TV-OS or even a voice command speaker like Amazon Echo. Unlike most IT services firms, our approach is more consultative and product centric. We work with clients not just as service providers but as consultants for their product and help them innovate and develop the best version of their vision.
Additionally, on the technology services side, we create plug and play models for various customer segments basis our insights. For instance, for the vast number of public libraries in the US, we have a white label product where a Library could 'plug and play' their own App on the iOS or Android App Stores.
Our three pillars are inspired innovation, intelligent design and flawless execution. If that sounds like a boring corporate brochure, you've got to hear us talking about it - we promise an interesting conversation!
